summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ALPHA&CO POS system Sprint 1 MVP. Backend APIs working well, frontend UI functional with minor payment completion issue.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns status 200 instead of 201 for successful sale creation
minor_bugs.impact: Cosmetic - sale is created successfully but wrong HTTP status

ui_bugs.issue: Emergent badge overlay prevents clicking pay button normally

integration_issues.issue: Payment processing shows error toast 'Erreur lors de l'enregistrement' and cart not cleared

passed_tests: POS screen loads with products grid and cart sidebar
Product search by SKU (GG10WP035020) works correctly
Product search by name (Tuyau) works correctly
Category filter buttons work (Tout/Alles, Tuyaux, Fixations, etc.)
Add product to cart with toast notification works
Cart quantity controls (+ and -) work properly
Customer select modal opens and search works
Global discount dialog (KORTING button) opens and applies discount
Payment modal opens and shows all payment methods
Payment method selection works (Cash, Card, Bank transfer)
Amount input and quick amount buttons work
Backend API endpoints all functional (19/20 tests passed)
Sale creation API works (despite wrong status code)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix payment completion error - sale creation API call is failing on frontend causing 'Erreur lors de l'enregistrement' error and preventing cart from being cleared after payment. Also fix Emergent badge z-index to prevent click interception.

success_percentage.backend: 95% (19/20 tests passed - minor status code issue)
success_percentage.frontend: 85% (payment completion failing, but all UI components work)
